title: Apple Thief

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Throw apples at someone. They get confused and are roleblocked.
- Steal someone's apples after throwing apples at them. Because they got used to eating apples, they die from withdrawal.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Stealing apples from a Fallen Angel will allow you to use the ability of that Fallen Angel the next time you throw apples at someone.
**Sin of Stolen Apples** - When you're the last Fallen Angel, throwing apples at someone will allow you to control who they visit. You also learn their role.

desc:

*And then we have the cause of the apple shortage, who is definitely not being visited by Santa this year, the one and only Apple Thief!*
*Yeaaaaaah!*
